g-0: ^Sorry, sorry, I was busy doing something and...
g-1: ^I'm Cleo. I came here just recently.
^Cool, cool. What brings you to this old shack, then?
g-2: ^I was sent here by Bengt. He told me to speak to someone called Irma.
^You're speaking to her right now! How can I help you?
g-3: ^I need to get some upgrades for my boat. I was told you could help me with that.
^You've definitely come to the right place, then!
^I'm in desperate need of a cog! It's for a project of mine.
^Sigrid has a bunch of spare cogs for her lighthouse.
^If you're up for it, I'd like you to go and borrow one for me.
^If I don't get this tower up and running again, poor Ulrich is gonna miss his radio program!

c-4: ^Ulrich might miss his radio show? What show?
^[Irma looks around and then leans in close, like she's about to spill a secret.]
^There's only one program our radios can pick up on from all the way out here...
^It's this out-loud reading of a really, REALLY sappy book series.
^I caught Ulrich listening to it once, and I'm pretty sure I saw tears in his eyes! Like, actual tears!
^I don't have the guts to bring it up to him, myself! Gosh, that would be scary!
^But if you're ever feeling brave enough to do it, try not to tease him too hard.
^Anyway, are you going to help me?
